name: Cube Blast Journey
description:
Have you ever had the dream of world travelling? In Cube Blast Journey, various countries filled with challenging and amazing puzzles and cubes in tons of levels await you to blast!

Features:
- Travel-themed cubes and blockers to blast! Traveling all over the world has never been so easy!
- Mighty pets skills that can blast a bunch of the cubes
- Win unique pets' outfits by solving puzzles and change for them!
- Collect all stars in every level and you'll meet new pets!
- Powerful boosters like bombs that will help to crush your way to the next level!
- Totally free and offline game that you can play whenever and wherever

How to play:
- Tap and match two or more cubes of same colors to blast them!
- More cubes you blast with only one tap, better your combo will be! Better the combo, more powerful the booster!
- Tap boosters, blast cubes together, and score points!
- Make special toy combos to help you crush various barriers
- Complete daily events to get more power-ups!

Match toy cubes, solve block puzzle. Cube Blast Journey can be enjoyed in short sessions, e.g. while you're waiting for your coffee or taking the bus home. It's a very relaxing match 2 and blast cubes game.

Cube Blast Journey is an endless puzzle game with addictive gameplay and a lot of cute pets! There are many well-designed levels in this toy cubes match puzzle game. It's easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
